addon.name: 中国网络电视台直播(CNTV Live)

extension.summary: 中国网络电视台直播插件
extension.description: CNTV Live video plugin[CR][CR]Note: [CR]1.The plugin will auto call CCTVPlayerOcxReg.exe to regist player ocx at the first run.[CR]2.The default key setting of the external player similar as XBMC: F8 - Mute / F9 - VolumeDown / F10 - VolumeUp / [ - ZoomIn / ] - ZoomOut / SPACE - Pause / X - Exit[CR]You can run key setting program to custom the key map for external player, file path:[CR]plugin.video.cntv-live\resources\player\KeymapSet.exe[CR]3.on the non-PRC OS environment, you need to do the following settings:[CR]On Windows 7 (similar for Windows XP):[CR]Go to "Control Panel"=>"Region and Language"=>Select Tab "Administrative"[CR]Click button "Change system locale" to "Chinese (Simplified, PRC)"[CR]and restart the machine as instructed.

中国网络电视台直播插件[CR][CR]说明：[CR]1.首次进入本插件会自动运行CCTVPlayerOcxReg.exe进行播放控件注册；[CR]2.外挂播放器按键默认设置与XBMC相近：F8 - 静音 / F9 - 音量减 / F10 - 音量增 / [ - 画面缩小 / ] - 画面放大 / SPACE - 播放暂停 / X - 关闭程序[CR]你也可以运行插件文件夹下的设置程序调整按键：[CR]plugin.video.cntv-live\resources\player\KeymapSet.exe
